message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking for $15,000 for it.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider this offer?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is really my bottom line. I know how valuable this product is and I'm confident you'll see a return on your investment.  What would you say to meeting in the middle at $12,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I'm still not able to meet at $12,500. However, I would like to suggest $11,000 as a compromise. I believe this offers a fair price for both of us.
